get.description: Fetch analytics for a specific professional. Only the corresponding professional can view their analytics.

post.description: Handles new user registration safely with either email or mobile.
Verifies the OTP sent during signup for either email or mobile and returns a JWT token.
Initiates login for a verified user by sending an OTP.
Verifies the login OTP and returns a JWT with user information including avatar_id.

schema.title: Response Verify Login Otp Auth Login Verify Post

post.description:
Updates consent for the currently authenticated user, but only if the
new values are different from the existing ones.
Logs out the current user by adding their token's unique ID (jti) to a denylist in Redis.

Initiates the account deletion process for the authenticated user.
This will delete ALL user data including:
- User profile and authentication data
- All avatars and S3 files
- All memories and uploaded files
- All visualizations and generated images
- All questionnaire history
- All live sessions and bookings
- All payments and subscriptions
- All family relationships
- All audit logs and activity data

Verifies the OTP and performs comprehensive account deletion.
This will permanently delete ALL user data including:
- User profile and authentication data
- All avatars and S3 files
- All memories and uploaded files
- All visualizations and generated images
- All questionnaire history
- All live sessions and bookings
- All payments and subscriptions
- All family relationships
- All audit logs and activity data

Admin/self endpoint to initiate deletion for a specific user_id.
Allowed if the current user is the same as user_id or has admin role.

Admin/self endpoint to verify OTP and complete deletion for a specific user_id.
Allowed if the current user is the same as user_id or has admin role.

get.description:
Verify if a user has been completely deleted.
This endpoint can be used to check if a user ID exists in the system.
Returns 'No such user with this ID exists' if user is completely deleted.

post.description: Create a family invite with consent checks and rate limiting.
Accept a family invitation using the invite token.

schema.title: Response Get User Families Family  Get

get.description: Get all members of a specific family, if the current user is also a member.

schema.title: Response Get Family Members Family  Family Id  Members Get

get.description: Get all sessions booked by the current user.

schema.title: Response Get My Bookings Sessions My Bookings Get

get.description: Get all sessions booked with the current professional (for professionals).

post.description: Generate a LiveKit call link and participant access token for the current user.

get.description: Get call details for a specific session.

post.description: Mark a call as started and track participant join time.
Mark a call as ended and calculate duration.

get.description: Get call history for current user (paginated).
Get call history for the current professional.

post.description:
Upload an avatar image for the authenticated user.
Accepts only image files (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP, TIFF, SVG).

get.description:
Get comprehensive avatar details by avatar ID.
Returns all avatar information including personalization data.
Users can only access their own avatars.

delete.description:
Delete an avatar by ID.
Users can only delete their own avatars.

put.description:
Update avatar details and optionally update the avatar image.

- avatar_name: Name the avatar will use to introduce themselves
- avatar_dob: Avatar's date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- avatar_about_me: About me information for avatar introduction
- name: General avatar name
- status: Avatar status
- file: Optional new image file to replace the current avatar image

All fields are optional. Only provided fields will be updated.

get.description: Get all avatars for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Get User Avatars Api Avatar List Get

get.description: Get the primary (most recent) avatar for the authenticated user.

put.description:
Mark an avatar as verified.
Users can only verify their own avatars.

Personalize an avatar with name, date of birth, and about me information.
This information will be used for the avatar's introduction.

get.description: Public listing of upcoming session slots (available or booked) for a professional.

schema.title: Response List Professional Sessions Professionals  Professional Id  Sessions Available Get
Response Get My Availability Professional Sessions Availability Get

get.description:
Get all visualizations created by a specific user.

Args:
    user_id: The UUID of the user whose visualizations to retrieve
    limit: Maximum number of visualizations to return (default: 100)
    offset: Number of visualizations to skip for pagination (default: 0)
    current_user: The authenticated user making the request
    db: Database session

Returns:
    UserVisualizationsResponse: List of visualizations with metadata

post.description:
Generate personalized self-reflection questionnaire based on user prompt

This endpoint:
1. Takes a user prompt describing their current state/feelings
2. Uses LLM to select 5 most relevant questions from a curated database
3. Stores the interaction in the database
4. Returns the selected questions with multiple choice options

get.description:
Get user's questionnaire generation history

Returns paginated list of previous questionnaire generations

schema.title: Response Get Questionnaire History Questionnaire History Get

get.description:
Get a specific questionnaire generation by ID

Returns the details of a specific questionnaire generation

delete.description:
Delete a specific questionnaire generation

Allows users to delete their questionnaire history

post.description: Generate questionnaire prompts and recommend therapists aligned with the user's input.
